review_text:
OAKLAND, NJ*******M&T BANK--- a bunch of SCAMMERS. They offered a $200 gift card if you opened a new checking account with $500, which we did. $200 was to be paid after the account was open for a specified number of  weeks. The bank VP stated to my wife and me that there were no other requirements since we had received a "special deal "mailer from the bank.  When it came time to pay us the $200 the banks VP said. "OH NO WE CANT PAY YOU THE PROMOTIONAL FEE OF $200, because you didnt fulfill the requirements ". HUH????? The M&T BANK SCAMMED US.  So how can you even trust them to be honest with your money.You Cant!!! They are dishonest, scammers and a bad place to put your money in OAKLAND, NJ*******
Worse yet, M&T BANK PEOPLE ARE LIARS.

------------STAY CLEAR OF M&T BANK------------------
